00057 void CDisplaySettingsButton::optionToggled(int ID){
00058     m_popup->setItemChecked( ID, !(m_popup->isItemChecked(ID)));
00059     if (!m_popup->text(ID).isEmpty())
00060       *(m_dict[m_popup->text(ID)]) =  m_popup->isItemChecked(ID);
00061     emit sigChanged();
00062 }

00065 int CDisplaySettingsButton::populateMenu(void){
00066 
00067     int ret = 0;
00068 
00069     m_popup->clear();
00070     m_popup->insertTitle(i18n("Display options"));
00071     m_popup->setCheckable(true);
00072 
00073     ret += addMenuEntry(i18n("Show headings"),  &m_moduleSettings->headings,
00074         isOptionAvailable(CSwordBackend::headings));
00075   ret += addMenuEntry(i18n("Use linebreaks"), &m_displaySettings->lineBreaks, true);
00076     ret += addMenuEntry(i18n("Show versenumbers"), &m_displaySettings->verseNumbers, true);
00077 
00078     ret += addMenuEntry(i18n("Show footnotes"), &m_moduleSettings->footnotes,
00079         isOptionAvailable(CSwordBackend::footnotes ));
00080     ret += addMenuEntry(i18n("Show Strong's Numbers"), &m_moduleSettings->strongNumbers,
00081         isOptionAvailable(CSwordBackend::strongNumbers ));
00082 
00083     ret += addMenuEntry(i18n("Show morphologic tags"),&m_moduleSettings->morphTags,
00084         isOptionAvailable(CSwordBackend::morphTags ));
00085     ret += addMenuEntry(i18n("Show lemmas"),&m_moduleSettings->lemmas,
00086         isOptionAvailable(CSwordBackend::lemmas ));
00087     ret += addMenuEntry(i18n("Show Hebrew vowel points"), &m_moduleSettings->hebrewPoints,
00088         isOptionAvailable(CSwordBackend::hebrewPoints ));
00089     ret += addMenuEntry(i18n("Show Hebrew cantillation marks"), &m_moduleSettings->hebrewCantillation,
00090         isOptionAvailable(CSwordBackend::hebrewCantillation ));
00091     ret += addMenuEntry(i18n("Show Greek accents"), &m_moduleSettings->greekAccents,
00092         isOptionAvailable(CSwordBackend::greekAccents ));
00093 
00094     return ret;
00095 }

00098 int CDisplaySettingsButton::addMenuEntry( const QString name, const bool* option, const bool available){
00099     if (available){
00100         m_dict.insert( name, option);
00101         m_popup->setItemChecked(m_popup->insertItem( name ), *option );
00102         return 1;
00103     }
00104     return 0;
00105 }

00107 bool CDisplaySettingsButton::isOptionAvailable( const CSwordBackend::FilterOptions option){
00108     bool ret = false;
00109     for (m_modules.first(); m_modules.current(); m_modules.next())
00110         ret = ret || m_modules.current()->has(option);
00111     return ret;
00112 }

00120 void CDisplaySettingsButton::setItemStatus( const int index, const bool checked ){
00121     qWarning("CDisplaySettingsButton::setItemStatus");
00122     const int ID = m_popup->idAt(index);
00123     m_popup->setItemChecked(ID, checked);
00124     const QString text = m_popup->text(ID);
00125     qWarning("set %c to %i",(const char*)text.local8Bit(), (int)checked);
00126     
00127     
00128     if (m_dict[text])
00129       *(m_dict[text]) = checked;
00130 }
